name: Simply Throwable
description:
-Simply throwable-

A game where you yeet your enemies into the wall or crush them with a asteroid.

-Game Idea-

Simple room based top down shooter. Use your tracktorBeam to grab stuff. Try not to die because of bullets or booms.

-Controls-

Use wasd to move. Click and hold to grab asteroid and enemies. Let go to yeet them! Grab the wheel to rotate the roundabout! R to restart level.

-Enemies-

A firing ship, static turret and homing booms.

-Warning-

Last level has earrape and a lot of laginess!
